name: @wolframkriesing/picossg
description: The pico static side generator, the simplest one I ever wanted and hopefully 'found'.

scripts.build:watch: node --watch-path test/content --watch-path src/build.js build-cli.js -c test/content -o dist
scripts.test: diff -ru test/golden-ref dist > /tmp/diffout; cat /tmp/diffout | diffstat; if [ -s /tmp/diffout ]; then echo ❌ Differences found; else echo ✅ OK; fi
scripts.test:watch: npx nodemon --quiet --legacy-watch --watch dist --watch test/golden-ref --watch src/build.js --ext '*' --exec "bash -c 'npm test --silent'"

author: Wolfram Kriesing
